name: Logo Tee - Black
description:
We needed a logo symbolic of what we stand for - success. The red human here raises his arms in success found and tribulations triumphed. This is part-homage to Rocky, a movie shot in the city we live outside of. It also represents success in general; this is a lifestyle after all. We look forward to using this in apparel, sponsorship, music, MMA and more. Believe the hype

Reach for the stars.

name: Miller Hype
description:
OK, so here at Believe the Hype Apparel, we like to have a good time. We like to get "hype" on the weekends, and our drink of choice is Believe the Hype Light. 

Low cal, high fun. Low price, high popularity factor.

Drink to success. Winning is a good taste.

name: BTH Apparel x Charlie Like the River Necklace
description:
These necklaces are each hand-painted onto square wooden pendants and hung on 36'' chain necklaces. 
They read "BELIEVE THE HYPE" in red over a black on white swirl background. 

Charlie hand-painted every single one, so even while they are all similar in design, each one is completely different from the other and 100% unique.  His necklaces can be seen on AER, Mac Miller, Das Racist,  Moosh and Twist, Guy Harrison and many more! 

Cop yours today while they last! 


@charlieliketheriver
http://www.charlieliketheriver.com/
https://www.facebook.com/charlieliketheriver

There will be more collabs on the way!

description: Bold, proud, and in your face. Believe the hype is more than just a brand; it's a mind set. Exude confidence in yourself in this shirt, and make those around you believe in your movement.

name: BTH Original - White
description: This shirt is a bold, old-school design that is what it says. It makes a statement to everyone that sees it to believe the hype. Whether you are the hottest girl, the best rapper, the best in your sport, the biggest grinder...etc,... this shirt says you believe your own hype, others can't help but join.

description: We at BTH Apparel like to have a good time. Usually involved are parties and beautiful women. So when it's the weekend....GET F***in hype!!

name: Phillies Believe the Hype 3/4 Sleeves
description:
This is our old-school look Phillies tee. The City of Brotherly Love's own beloved Phillies have a STACKED roster and we at BTH believe there are big things in store for them.

This tee is 3/4 length sleeves, that of a traditional baseball shirt.

name: Ladies Phillies Believe The Hype 3/4 Sleeves
description:
There is a lot of hype surrounding the Phillies upcoming season. The 4-headed pitching monster, Ryan Howard, J-Roll....what is not to like about this team? BELIEVE THE HYPE .... Phillies WS champs in 2011.

This tee is 3/4 length sleeves, that of a traditional baseball shirt.

This ones for the ladies....

name: Holdmadick (Blue on Green/ Purple On Grey)
description:
***Limited Edition*** 

In moments of disdain, or in pure glory....only one phrase can adequately capture the feeling....holdmadick.

"Yo this essay can really holdmadick"
"Rain again?... this weather can holdmadick"

*Game winning shot* "HOLDMADICKKKKKKKKKK"
"Bud light is on sale?! Holdmadick!"


SUBMIT YOUR HOLDMADICK PHRASE to @BTHAPPAREL and we will post it here.

name: Lil B the Based God Shirt
description:
THANK YOU BASED GOD

Believe the Hype Apparel wanted to make a #rare #legendary #based #artifact for all the Lil B fans out there. 

The front is a large image of the Based God's face with some of his coined ad-libs

The back says thank you based god with some master chef utensils.

name: Belieb The Hype
description:
Justin Bieber ....the multimillionaire, multi-talented, Selena Gomez wielding teenage heartthrob. 

This guy, hate him or love him, is living every man's dream. He embodies the BTH spirit. 


And this shirt would just be funny to do, so we did it.

name: Cassette Ladies Tee
description:
This one's for the all the ladies out there - jawnwear by Believe The Hype apparel. 

This design is a little more conservative and low-key,but it still shows Believe The Hype's roots in the music world. We like to kick it old school sometimes - 90's hip hop was the golden era and we pay tribute to it with the cassette design.

name: Ladies Cassette Pink Deep V-Neck
description:
This one's for the all the ladies out there - jawnwear by Believe The Hype apparel. 

This design is a little more conservative and low-key...and now low cut...but it still shows Believe The Hype's roots in the music world. We like to kick it old school sometimes - 90's hip hop was the golden era and we pay tribute to it with the cassette design.

name: Cassette Tee
description: This shirt is a little more conservative and low-key, but it still shows Believe The Hype's roots in the music world. We like to kick it old school sometimes - 90's hip hop was the golden era and we pay tribute to it with the cassette design.

name: BTH Shotglasses "Bottoms Up"
description:
Bottoms up!!! Be sure to party in style. This is a standard size shot glass with our imprint on it. 

The perfect match for our "Get F***ing Hype" and "Miller Hype" shirts. Grab one of those tees/tanks and a shotglass from Believe the Hype Apparel and be the life of the party. 

Peep the pictures for actual shot. Cover shot is a virtual representation. 


*Washing instructions* "Do not wash your printed glassware in a dishwasher. We recommend washing printed glassware in warm soapy water with a soft sponge prior to use"

Shipping includes PA Sales Tax.

name: BTH Snapback Hat
description:
This hat is a black, flat-brim snapback cap with our OG logo on the front, and Headphones logo on the side of the hat.

Rock this with any of our tees. Good for a lazy sweatpants day, and even better when you're all swagged out for the night. 

View the pictures for actual pictures of hat. 

IF YOU WANT A CUSTOM HAT (CUSTOM COLOR HAT/STITCHING),EMAIL SEEMEDAGGIE@GMAIL.COM WITH INQUIRY. 

Shipping includes PA Sales Tax.

name: Henny BTH Collab
description:
** No Discount Codes Accepted for this Item**

Hendersin and Believe the Hype Apparel collaborated on a shirt (the first of many to come) and we let you pick the design! This is the winning design. 
The #TEAMHENNY tag has been all over Twitter and Hendersin's fans are some of the best around. THIS IS FOR YOU!!!


Facebook.com/Believethehypeapparel
Twitter.com/bthapparel 
Facebook.com/Hendersin
Twitter.com/Hendersin

"HENNY IN YA SYSTEM" coming soon!

name: BTH Condoms- Believe the Pipe
description:
Well, let us face the facts...wearing BTHA will get you laid... So be safe. Believe the...Pipe? Not only is a snapback cool for your head, but so is a jimmysleeve for your other one. 

Wherever your weekend takes you, make sure you stay safe, seriously.  There are a lot of unfortunate diseases out there so strap up when you do the sexytime. 

Buy any two tees and receive one free!

BTH headphones logo printed on Paradise brand condom
Legal : No contraceptive provides 100% protection against pregnancy/STD. If used properly, latex condoms will help to reduce the risk of transmission of HIV/AIDS and many other sexually transmitted diseases including Chlamydia, Genital Herpes, Genital Warts,Gonorrhea, Hepatitis B and Syphilis.
This Product contains Natural rubber latex, and may cause allergic reactions. 

Shipping includes PA Sales Tax.
